description: Uniformed officers in the States of Jersey Police will no longer require special permission.
title: Taser use to be 'at discretion' of Jersey police officers
title_page: Taser use to be 'at discretion' of Jersey police officers - BBC News
maintext: The report must include a breakdown of the gender, age, and ethnic background of people on whom a Taser was used, as well as the number of times a Taser was deployed by an officer on their own.
